subject: BNP Paribas Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: With his semifinal win at the BNP Paribas Open, John Isner became the first American to beat a No. 1-ranked player since 2008, ensuring a move into the top 10 in next week’s rankings.
snippet: With his semifinal win at the BNP Paribas Open, John Isner became the first American to beat a No. 1-ranked player since 2008, ensuring a move into the top 10 in next week’s rankings.
